item.title: Meghann Fahy Admits ‘Sirens’ Emmy Nomination Was “Very Unexpected”
item.description: Fahy is nominated in the best lead actress in a limited or anthology series or movie category for her role in the Netflix show.

item.title: Emmy Anomalies: Their Shows Were Snubbed, But They Weren’t
item.description: Nearly a dozen of this year’s acting nominees were from series that were otherwise completely shut out.
